Science : curriculum guide for teaching gifted children science in grades one through three: a sample ecology unit

Science: curriculum guide for teaching gifted children science in grades one through three: a sample ecology unit / Howard N Hubbard 1977 [1977 ed.]. English Book vii, 32 pages ; 23 cm Sacramento : The Dept., Helps gifted pupils to take an active part in meaningful learning activities that concern the world of natural science. Contains a sample teaching-learning plan and eight sample lesson plans. The emphasis is on ecology and its aspects, such as the biological, the environmental, and the geological.; Chapter 1: Purposes and approaches -- Overview -- Behavioral objectives -- Generalizations and concepts. -- Chapter 2: Sample teaching-learning plan -- A unit on ecology -- Evaluation. Chapter 3: Sample lesson plans -- Subtratum -- Animal movement -- Seed dispersal -- Temperature -- Its influence on the environment -- Light -- Food -- Water -- Erosion.; Helps gifted pupils to take an active part in meaningful learning activities that concern the world of natural science. Contains a sample teaching-learning plan and eight sample lesson plans. The emphasis is on ecology and its aspects, such as the biological, the environmental, and the geological.
